intro.description: The next steps show you how to create a Test Step.

item.title: Open the Test Case Editor
item.description: Double-click on the Test Case you just created to open the Test Case Editor

item.title: Add a new Test Step
item.description:
In the Test Case Editor, right click on the Test Case and select:
Add > New Test Step
Enter Enter value one as the Test Step name.
Select Component with Text Input as the component.
Enter adder_value1 as the component name.
Select Replace Text as the action.
Click OK.

item.title: Enter a parameter value
item.description:
In the Properties View, enter =VALUE1 into the parameter field and press enter.
This is a reference. The parameter value will be entered later.
You can see the referenced parameter next to the Test Case in the editor.
This makes the Test Case more reusable.

item.title: Save the editor
item.description: Use the save button on the toolbar button to save the editor
